pullrequest.title: Stop the cordless drill from dancing around

content.raw: Actually, checking again setting the table to static and not applying your patch fixes the problem equally well. It only "drifts" (an extremely tiny bit) for 10 seconds until it stabilizes, using your fix it only stabilizes faster, but doesn't prevent it from drifting without the table being static (the table not being static causes penetrations between table and drill which then leads to the drill not stabilizing and both table and drill drifting over time ... we've had this discussion back in the original [qual arena pull-request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/124/four-vrc-qual-worlds/diff#comment-120309))
